dsn.description: The Data Source Name (DSN) for your Sentry project. This is used to identify and authenticate with your Sentry instance.

environment.description: The environment name (e.g., production, staging, or development) to associate with the events sent to Sentry.

release.description: The version of the application associated with the events. This can help in tracking issues across deployments.

debug.description: Enable or disable debug mode for the Sentry integration.

traceSampleRate.description: A decimal value between 0 and 1 indicating the percentage of transactions to be sampled for performance monitoring.

breadcrumbsLogger.description: The loggers to be used for breadcrumbs (e.g., ActiveSupportLogger, HttpLogger).

backgroundWorkerThreads.description: The number of background worker threads for processing.

excludedExceptions.description: List of exceptions to be excluded from Sentry reporting.
